summary: An Ordinance authorizing and directing the City Engineer to incur an indebtedness against the General Fund of The City of Seattle, in the sum of Two Thousand One Hundred Four and 68/100 Dollars ($2104.68), for the purpose of completing the improvement of Melrose Avenue North et al., by paving the same, as authorized by Ordinance No. 21194, creating Local Improvement District No. 2100.
